title: What’s your favorite genre of people? - Quora

response.answer_text: People don’t belong in buckets or tribes or categories but let’s say a “favorite” type of person is a human who is worthy of my respect, appreciation and whose company I enjoy. Those people share a few qualities: curiosity — they love learning, which means they are good listeners; creativity — self-expression is important in everything they do regardless of what others thinks of their expression; they possess a gentle soul — they accept other humans for who they are without judgement and always seek positive, peaceful encounters.
Genre of people? I guess the ones who are always accepting of others.
